languages.text: "Впрочем... нить, что связывала наши пути, разорвалась в тот же миг, как я осознала причастность мон-кай к исчезновению моего дома. Дабы сбежать от Вольного Торговца, я выследила и уничтожила {mf|его|ее} главную ищейку, что многие годы преследовала наших братьев в этой части галактики. И этим заслужила прощение пред трибуналом".

traits.locale_text: "Впрочем... нить, что связывала наши пути, разорвалась в тот же миг, как я осознала причастность мон-кай к исчезновению моего дома. Дабы сбежать от Вольного Торговца, я выследила и уничтожила {mf|его|ее} главную ищейку, что многие годы преследовала наших братьев в этой части галактики. И этим заслужила прощение пред трибуналом".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем... нить, что связывала наши пути, разорвалась в тот же миг, как я осознала причастность мон-кай к исчезновению моего дома. Дабы сбежать от Вольного Торговца, я выследила и уничтожила {mf|его|ее} главную ищейку, что многие годы преследовала наших братьев в этой части галактики. И этим заслужила прощение пред трибуналом".

traits.locale_text: "However... the thread that bound our ways broke the moment I realized the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee from the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated his chief tracker who pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned forgiveness before the court."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

To flee from the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated his chief tracker who pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned forgiveness before the court."

traits.locale_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Cela étant dit... les liens qui nous unissaient se sont rompus à l'instant où j'ai compris que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh était {mf|impliqué|impliquée} dans la disparition de mon foyer. J'ai suivi puis éliminé son traqueur principal qui poursuivait nos semblables dans cette partie de la galaxie depuis de nombreuses années pour me libérer {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et ainsi obtenir le pardon de la cour. »
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: « Cela étant dit... les liens qui nous unissaient se sont rompus à l'instant où j'ai compris que {mf|le|la} mon-keigh était {mf|impliqué|impliquée} dans la disparition de mon foyer. Pour me libérer {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, j'ai suivi puis éliminé son traqueur principal qui poursuivait nos semblables dans cette partie de la galaxie depuis de nombreuses années. Et ainsi obtenir le pardon de la cour. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “然而……当我意识到，这只猴子可能与我的故乡失踪有关时，我就切断了我们之间的联系。多年来，{mf|他|她}的首席猎手一直在这片星区追捕我们的族人。为了躲避{mf|他|她}的追捕，我消灭了{mf|他|她}的首席猎手，因此也在法庭上得到了宽恕。”
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: “然而……当我意识到，这只猴子可能与我的故乡失踪有关时，我就切断了我们之间的联系。多年来，{mf|他|她}的首席猎手一直在这片星区追捕我们的族人。为了躲避{mf|他|她}的追捕，我消灭了{mf|他|她}的首席猎手，因此也在法庭上得到了宽恕。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「だが…故郷の消滅にモン＝ケイが関与していることに気付いた瞬間、我らを繋いでいた糸は切れた。我は自由開拓者から逃れるため、銀河のこの地域で長年にわたって我が血族を追っていた、{mf|彼|彼女}の手による追跡者を探し出し、抹殺した。こうして、我はこの法廷の前で恩赦を得たのだ」
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: 「だが…故郷の消滅にモン＝ケイが関与していることに気付いた瞬間、我らを繋いでいた糸は切れた。我は自由開拓者から逃れるため、銀河のこの地域で長年にわたって我が血族を追っていた、{mf|彼|彼女}の手による追跡者を探し出し、抹殺した。こうして、我はこの法廷の前で恩赦を得たのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Aber ... der Faden unseres gemeinsamen Pfads riss, als ich herausfand, dass {mf|dieser|diese} Chem-Pan-Sey etwas mit dem Verschwinden meiner Heimatwelt zu tun hatte. Um {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu entkommen, spürte ich {mf|seinen|ihren} wichtigsten Verfolger auf und beseitigte ihn. Er war in diesem Teil der Galaxis jahrelang hinter meinem Volk her gewesen. Und sich damit vor diesem Gericht Gnade verdient."
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: "Aber ... der Faden unseres gemeinsamen Pfads riss, als ich herausfand, dass {mf|dieser|diese} Chem-Pan-Sey etwas mit dem Verschwinden meiner Heimatwelt zu tun hatte. Um {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu entkommen, spürte ich {mf|seinen|ihren} wichtigsten Verfolger auf und beseitigte ihn. Dieser war in diesem Teil der Galaxis jahrelang hinter meinem Volk her. Und so hat sie sich vor diesem Hof Vergebung verdient."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No obstante... el hilo que unía nuestras sendas se partió tan pronto me di cuenta de que {mf|el|la} mon-keigh había participado en la destrucción de mi hogar. Para huir {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, localicé y eliminé a su mejor rastreador, que llevaba años dando caza a mis congéneres en este rincón de la galaxia. Y así me he ganado la clemencia del tribunal».
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: «No obstante... el hilo que mantenía nuestro vínculo se partió tan pronto me di cuenta de que {mf|el|la} mon-keigh había participado en la destrucción de mi hogar. Para huir {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente, localicé y eliminé a su mejor rastreador, que llevaba años dando caza a mis congéneres en este rincón de la galaxia. Y así me he ganado el perdón a ojos del tribunal».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Yollarımızı bir arada tutan dikişler ise mon-keigh'in evimin yok oluşuyla ilgisi olduğunu öğrendiğimde koptu. Hür Tacir'den kaçmak için galaksinin bu bölümünde türümüzü yıllar boyunca takip etmiş olan baş iz sürücüyü bulup saf dışı bıraktım, bu sayede de bu divanın bana ılıman yaklaşması hakkını elde ettim."
languages.original_text: "However... the thread that bound our paths broke the moment I realised the mon-keigh's involvement in the disappearance of my home. To flee the Rogue Trader, I tracked down and eliminated {mf|his|her} chief tracker who has pursued our kin in this part of the galaxy for many years. And thus earned clemency before this court."

traits.locale_text: "Yollarımızı bir arada tutan dikişler ama, mon-keigh'in evimin yok oluşuyla ilgisi olduğunu öğrendiğimde koptular. Hür Tacir'den kaçmak için galaksinin bu bölümünde türümüzü yıllar boyunca takip etmiş olan baş iz sürücüyü bulup saf dışı bıraktım, bu sayede de bu divanın bana ılıman yaklaşması hakkını elde ettim."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
